snippet: A retired Tampa police officer who became enraged at another man’s cellphone use has been charged with second-degree murder in the case.
abstract: Dispute over texting at Tampa-area movie theater ends in man's death when retired police captain in audience shoots him; Curtis Reeves is charged with second-degree murder in death of victim, identified as Chad Oulson.
lead_paragraph: A retired Tampa police officer who became enraged at another man’s cellphone use has been charged with second-degree murder in the case.

headline.main: Man Killed During Argument Over Texting at Movie Theater
headline.print_headline: Texter Is Killed at the Movies
